    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

            <entry>cahi1:data_83709</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Grande théorie du Big Bang</string>
            <string language="en">Big bang theory</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grosse Knalltheorie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Teoria grande do estrondo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Teoria grande di scoppio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θεωρία μεγάλου κτυπήματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Teoría grande de la explosión</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Seconde sur trois illustrations montrant les  principes de la théorie du Big Bang. Une explosion énorme envoie voler la matière dans l'univers dans toutes les  directions.</string>
            <string language="en">Second of three illustrations showing the principles of the big bang theory. A huge explosion sends matter in the Universe flying out in all directions.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">grande théorie du Big Bang</string>
            <string language="en">big bang theory</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">directions</string>
            <string language="en">Directions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">explosions</string>
            <string language="en">explosions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">galaxies</string>
            <string language="en">galaxies</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">matière</string>
            <string language="en">matter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">particules</string>
            <string language="en">Particles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">univers</string>
            <string language="en">Universe</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">An zweiter Stelle von drei Abbildungen, welche 
die Grundregeln der grossen Knalltheorie zeigen. Eine sehr 
große Explosion sendet Stoff im Universumfliegen heraus in allen 
Richtungen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em segundo de três ilustrações que mostram os 
princípios da teoria grande do estrondo. Uma explosão enorme 
emite a matéria no vôo do universo para fora em todos os sentidos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In secondo luogo di tre illustrazioni che 
mostrano i principii della teoria grande di scoppio. 
Un'esplosione enorme trasmette la materia nel volo dell'universo
fuori in tutti i sensi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεύτερη τριών απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν τις αρχές 
της θεωρίας μεγάλου κτυπήματος. Μια τεράστια έκρηξη 
στέλνει το θέμα στον κόσμο πετώντας έξω σε όλες τις 
κατευθύνσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En segundo lugar de tres ilustraciones que 
muestran los principios de la teoría grande de la explosión. 
Una explosión enorme envía la materia en el vuelo del universo
hacia fuera en todas las direcciones.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">grosse Knalltheorie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Richtungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Explosionen</string>
          </keyword>
